documentation.text:
@notice Allow the owner of address `aproducer.address()` to
         act as a producer (by offering energy).

devdoc.author: Björn Stein, Quantum-Factory GmbH,                      https://quantum-factory.de

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: A contract that allows producer addresses to be registered.

deregisterProducer(address).notice: Cease allowing the owner of address         `aproducer.address()` to act as a producer (by         offering energy).

registerProducer(address).notice: Allow the owner of address `aproducer.address()` to         act as a producer (by offering energy).
